website_summaries.verdict: A decent quality manicure kit, but doesn't offer as many tools as some others.
pros: Includes finger and toenail clippers, cuticle scissors, nail scissors, tweezers, hoofstick, sapphire nail file, and nail pusher
Tools are nickel plated and the set comes with a storage case as well
cons: The nail clippers can break after some use
Nickel coating can cause issues for those who are allergic

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this manicure set very long and already both nail clippers are dull and barely cut through my nails, even when I apply a lot of pressure to them. This set gets a good rating , but my personal experience with this product is extremely disappointing! I have a cheap drug store set of clippers that cuts my nails easier and more cleanly than these do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Peterson

customer_reviews.title: A Handy Kit for Grooming Hands...and Feet
customer_reviews.text: I like this manicure set because it is so convenient and easy to pack for traveling. The implements are nickel plated stainless steel and they are durable and sharp enough to trim thick nails. The case appears to be ostrich...it's a remarkable imitation if it's not the real thing...and it is well crafted. My only regret is that I did not purchase one of the larger sets that included 2 types of nippers. This set does not include nippers.
customer_reviews.author: jvleearch

customer_reviews.title: Great German Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth one of this type of set I have ordered (the first two I gave as gifts, the second one I bought for me and it "disappeared" somewhere at my house). The quality of the product is really good, so much so that as I have previously stated I have continued to buy them. Great German quality, and machined well so it functions perfectly. I like that the cases come in different colors and textures so you can add a bit of personalizing to your grooming kit. It's put together really well and it's something that will last for a long time if you take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: MTPR

customer_reviews.title: I just received my order and check the nail clippers ...
customer_reviews.text: Nail Clippers are not made in Germany!! Like many others, I bought this product by reading the buyer comments and many says nail clipper are good because they are made in Germany. They are all wrong! Per seller, in the product features and details paragraph, it sail tools made in Germany, except the nail clipper. Here what the seller say: STEEL IMPLEMENTS: Hand made, bright nickel plated (protection against corrosion), polished and hardened. All sets come in an attractive gift box. Instruments are made in Solingen / Germany (except nail clippers).
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Stick to the all metal sets
customer_reviews.text: The metal parts are certainly quality. The clippers cut right through my thick nails like butter, much better than the cheap ones you get at the store. The problem? The plastic. The plastic that holds the file feels cheap and like the file could fall out at any moment. The other plastic is soft and ineffective, especially compared to metal versions I have used in the past. All that said, I do really like this set. It's just disappointing that a quality company like 3 Swords would use crappy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier in TX

customer_reviews.title: German Quality
customer_reviews.text: The set is made in Germany of Solingen steel. We have had this particular set for over a year, the other one is 25 years old. The 1 year old one is still as sharp as when we bought it and it gets used by three family members on weekly basis. Even the case is still in immaculate shape. It is a purchase one will not regret. The cost for the high quality product is almost the same, $4.79 more, than individually sourced items from Walmart or Target; the Chinese and Pakistani products are a few cents less, but their quality is pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dita W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a replacement of a set I bought in Germany 20 years ago. This is a VERY nice set, just as nice as my old one. And great price too. Compact set hor home or travel, more that enough instruments!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice compact grooming kit. I lost my last kit on a cruise, so I shopped around a while before replacing it. It has everything I need in a kit. I haven't had a chance to use all the items in the kit yet, but so far they all seem functional and of good quality. I'll try not to lose this one on my next cruise (whenever that will be). Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C Merle

customer_reviews.title: Drei Schwerter GmbH is a wonderful gift for the treatment of nails
customer_reviews.text: Exclusive 8-Piece MANICURE -... Kellermann & Co. Drei Schwerter GmbH is a wonderful gift for the treatment of nails. The quality of objects, design, packaging, everything at the highest level. And the delivery is done before the specified time. We are very satisfied with the work of AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Stark

customer_reviews.title: Scissors gets rusty.
customer_reviews.text: 7 months after purchase the main scissors started to get rust on the edges. They were never under wet conditions or anything similar. I'm very disappointed with the quality, definitely not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tbanano

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Travel Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, compact kit that is great for travelling. I would have given this 5 stars but the nail file blade is only a little over 2 1/4" long (total length ~3 3/4") it could have easily been an 1" longer and still fit in the case. Also my favorite finger nail clippers are the Revlon with the (R) on the handle (2 1/4+"). Great size, solid and last forever. The clippers here are about 2" long and feel a little small in my hands. That being said, if you need a great travelling kit, you can't go wrong with this one, Kit looks nice and very well made..
customer_reviews.author: Max Silent

customer_reviews.title: I had a pretty cheap, made in China
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy and hardly ever write product reviews. I had a pretty cheap, made in China, set before. This set is so much above and beyond in quality that I cannot even describe. I put the old set into the trash (and recycling bin) after I realized how much better this new set is in terms of sharpness, ease of use, handling. I am so happy I made this purchase. Solingen is a name that you should all recognize when it comes to high quality steel.
customer_reviews.author: Customer for Austin, TX

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality kit! All the tools you need and more for keeping your nails in shape. You can see and feel craftsmanship that went into the implements. There's even a Solingen tag on the cuticle scissors. That's real German steel, highly polished and perfectly fitted into a well made zippered case. I would rate it higher than 5 stars if possible. Can't say enough good things about this exceptional set from Three Swords. Best bargain for the money I've ever gotten off of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I wonderful little manicure set!
customer_reviews.text: As her first manicure set, this was the perfect gift for my grand daughter. Very very well made and the choice of clippers, and other useful items makes this a very complete and efficient article to use daily. It will last... and the quality is high end. Worth every penny. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dion Pageau

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice kit!
customer_reviews.text: I received this kit today & have already put it to use! This is a very nice, well made set of grooming tools! The clippers & scissors work very well, especially compared to some of those ‘cheap’ made ones you can purchase in the big chain stores! This kit is well worth what I paid for them considering I have much more invested in some of the poorly functioning ‘cheap’ variety!
customer_reviews.author: Solitary63

customer_reviews.title: Can't keep delivery commitment
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep del promise,not even close. Scissors are good, rest is cheap stamped stuff,some even plastic. This isn't the German precision that I used to know.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Miller

customer_reviews.title: superb quality
customer_reviews.text: I was always wondering what is the difference between average set from wall-mart for 10-15$ and premium, and was always choosing cheaper stuff. This time I ordered premium brand and was pleasantly surprised with the quality. Each item shows craftsmanship and does exactly what you expect. Leather case also scores super high grade.
customer_reviews.author: Mykyta Trunov

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and good quality. Thought about a more expensive set
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and good quality. Thought about a more expensive set, but this one is amazing and if I ever need to, I can buy it multiple times for the price of some of the other high end sets. Has all the tools you need in the perfect carrying case. Great for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- holds up to a lot of use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Highly recommend. Tools are sharp & well made. I’ve been using it for weeks now. There were so many options online that I researched online comments a lot. I’m glad I chose this one. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Kimmich

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and sharp. but the description clearly says that it will not rust ... but look at the photo, this is with careful use and keeping the scissor away from moisture. After use, I wiped them with a towel and stored them outside the case to allow them to dry. result in the photo. everything is in rust and I'm afraid to use it further.
customer_reviews.author: Iurii

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this grooming kit, because after the last visit at the groomers, our dog returned scared and shaking often. My husband has used it twice. The ceramic blades trim nicely. It's great that you can leave it connected to power while trimming. He likes the extra tools that are included. We have used the scissors for trimming our dog's face and areas that tickle him.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena F.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and fits nicely in my purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this manicure set so much that I bought another for my husband. The quality is outstanding. The price is GREAT! I know that I will be buying more sets for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L.

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy case
customer_reviews.text: The tools seem to be reasonably well made but the case is shoddy and cheap looking. What's the point of buying quality tools that should reasonably last a good while when the case they come in is too flimsy to last very long?
customer_reviews.author: C.V.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Little straps that hold tools in them. ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Little straps that hold tools in them....2 were broken when first opened. China quality. Should be 10 bucks. No more.
customer_reviews.author: elderjay

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel kit
customer_reviews.text: The set is good enough for your daily needs. The scissors are sharp and they do their job. Haven't tried the clippers however they look solid. A nice small set that you can travel with.
customer_reviews.author: CATALIN M MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! Buy this one! A+
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in an attractive, high quality, compact case. The instruments I've tried are very sharp and get the job done! And it was worth every penny I spent on it. It's the quality of something American made! A+
customer_reviews.author: Jim Vining

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework
customer_reviews.text: Picked this set up to clean up before job interviews and keep myself from biting my finger nails. I was hoping that this would be a quality set based off the reviews. After taking it out of the package I noticed the leather case was very poor quality and had some stitching coming apart. Some of the tools appear to be well constructed like the scissors, but the clippers and other stuff seem cheaply made. For $25, I think your money could be better spent elsewhere, but that's just a humble opinion, but I am sure it will still do the job. I would say $10 set at best.
customer_reviews.author: Justsumdude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my elderly mother who loves classy things ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my elderly mother who loves classy things - instruments are of high quality and case is as well. Excellent gift for your mother, sisters, daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small nail clipper broke on second use. Quality is not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set primarily for the nail clipper and to have a nice set for travel. The small nail clipper broke under normal use, the second time I used them. It just fell apart. The clipper I was replacing I had for over 20 years and it's still working, but had gotten dull over time. The case is nice, but breaking on the second use doesn't say much about the German quality I was expecting. I gave it 2 stars because I like the case.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck T.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I gave this to my wife as a gift and she is impressed. These tools are far superior to anything I’ve ever seen in a retail store. Especially drug or big/box stores.
customer_reviews.author: JDRanger

customer_reviews.title: Quality and craftsmanship!!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, made the right way. I've gifted at least 3 of these sets, and have received very positive feedback. Craftsmanship, quality, will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3Sword4Me
customer_reviews.text: Its an alright set, I'm keeping it. The clippers, scissors, and tweezers are nice. The nail file and cuticle tool are poor quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: 3 Swords manicure sets are made in Germany of Solingen steel. The have a long history of great quality and superior, precise cutting. This set is made for women, and my wife was delighted to get it as a gift,
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Miksis

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, beautiful for gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these as gifts. Very well made, neatly packaged and has all the necessary manicure equipment for men or women. The recipients all loved them and use them for travel and at home
customer_reviews.author: Gks

customer_reviews.title: Broke after very little use
customer_reviews.text: Nail clipper broke after only using a few times. The part where you place your thumb snapped into two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: just as ordered
customer_reviews.text: great product good price. great gift for grandson before he shipped out to Navy bootcamp..
customer_reviews.author: Marc Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Clip clip, snip snip.
customer_reviews.text: Received as a Christmas present. This is a nice small case ideal for use at home or packing for travel. All the pieces work great, they seem to be very well made so far. Scissors and clippers are nice and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: R. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Made in Germany. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Made in germany and it tells everything. Love it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Samira

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, solidly built.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've never bought a real nail care set before, just the run of the mill clippers from the department stores...and the difference is night and day. These are sharp, the are well constructed and function perfectly. I'll never buy cheap clippers again.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Rod, that's all.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and great selection of tools needed for at home manicure and pedicure. I love the case as it's easy to keep all of the tools in one convenient carrying case for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Crayton

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great quality
customer_reviews.text: We just used it and the product works great. I am thrilled that I found German quality at Amazon. The product is good quality and the case is besutifil, compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. Very high quality. The case is durable and attractive. The tools are all very good quality and look like they will last for years. I purchased this as a gift and I will be buying another one for myself. Product arrived nicely packaged and delivered on time. Very happy with this product and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wilm

customer_reviews.title: Great price Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product very nicely constructed a proud addition to my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: ChadlyNCo

customer_reviews.title: Nice - Good quality mens manicure kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace an old worn out one my husband has. Gave it to him today and he was THRILLED with it! He thought I spent a lot of money and when I told him how much it cost he didn't believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Better than average
customer_reviews.text: Better than average but not quite the quality I was hoping for. The nail scissors are neither as sharp nor as strong as I wanted. Not quite strong enough for toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice manicure set.
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for a 17yr old. She should have this the rest of her life. Nice quality. The case is man made "leather", which was great, because the recipient is a vegetarian, and those thing matter to her.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality set
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than the usual clippers you would find at the local box store. They are sharp and haven't dulled yet after repeated use. Worth the few extra $$ to get these instead of the throw-away kinds from the box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for college student (camouflage for boy) so I have not used it but it looks great and the quality seems excellent
customer_reviews.author: Lalibaba

customer_reviews.title: Great Grooming Gift
customer_reviews.text: I loved this , but it did not have a cuticle nipper . Very Nice Set .
customer_reviews.author: Wirewend

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The clippers slide out of your fingers because the surface is smooth and with no grip I would expect more from German quality! You mentioned that you were going to send me a replacement pair but I never received them my address is 610 McGregor Road Gloversville N.Y. 12078 I would purchase more if the clippers had more of a grip because I like how sharp they are.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Swords Manicure
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. The only complaint he has is the size of the finger nail file is too small for his hands. Other then that he. Likes it
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: good  german quality
customer_reviews.text: nice little kit, quality leather case and tools, bought 3 for my sons for Christmas. a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Payne

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quailty and packaging! This was a gift, given in the color red for a female, the casing was really pretty and the enclosed tools for pedicure/manicure were very well made. My Friend loved it.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: Travel manicure and pedicure kit to last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a high quality luxury item. The construction and finishes is absolutely perfect. Contains the perfect assortment of essential manicure and pedicure implements. The carrying case is very stylish and well constructed. Wish it would have had a push button opening mechanism rather than a zipper which would've made it than a zipper which would've made it easier to open and close with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ravard

customer_reviews.title: ... is a little sharper but the tweezers aren't so good..
customer_reviews.text: i guess everything is a little sharper but the tweezers aren't so good.......so for a cost of $26 i would expect more
customer_reviews.author: woodman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. This should last years given the quality of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: crf

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find good manicure sets anymore. We bought two sets. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Annette Sirmans

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!  I would buy again as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality product set and my family was so impressed, my husband and son bought one for each of them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheriindallas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High-quality stainless manicure tools in a classy leather case. Should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Loose the plastic!
customer_reviews.text: All cutting tools are sharp and work well. To lmprove quality and elegance remove plastic handle from file which works very well, the plastic gives a cheap look. Case should be larger for ease of tool removal/return and to add additional instruments in future.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.  Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Nice, refine sort of look to it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. I got these as a present for my mother. It has a nice presentation to it. Looks very nice. Makes a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my girlfriend would stop stealing my nail clippers. Nice case they come in and clips very well. I even find myself using the other pieces even though I just got it for the clippers and case
customer_reviews.author: James F. Hall

customer_reviews.title: very high quality
customer_reviews.text: great clippers and the nail files are very good. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: roger wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep track of
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set... I like how it comes with it's own storage. Goes in my nightstand to avoid falling victim to the fate these things typically endure. Makes it easy to keep track of.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzmanknot

customer_reviews.title: Quality case and quality utensils
customer_reviews.text: Use this in automobiles as one always seems to damage a nail when shopping and /or traveling. This is great quality. I am buying more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: susan schwerdtfeger

customer_reviews.title: Just What Was Needed
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kit is smaller than expected. I wasn’t expecting a cleaning cloth and directions on how to use the tools. Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! It came in three days and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He loved it! It came in three days and is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: John in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kit. I have bought several other kits in the past couple years and none of them stack up to this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great - nice quality as one would expect from German made products.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The large clippers broke after using twice. The small clippers are dull. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Well made..well received!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and my partner very much appreciated the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Candace B

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory manicure set
customer_reviews.text: A nice sized manicure/pedicure set which I used immediately. Nail scissors are sharp enough to cut my aged nails and I particularly like the nail files. I thought the price was fair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth clips and cuts
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest manicure kit I have ever used. Made in Germany, the scissors and clippers have an extremly smooth action and a very precise cut. Every component is made to the very highest of standards and will last you a lifetime. The case fits every item snuggly and is ideal for thise who travel often. Truley a very nice manicure set at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: kjl419

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item for a friend and he's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: elceed

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set. Don't waste your money on a cheaper set.
customer_reviews.author: 100lucy

customer_reviews.title: USED TOE NAIL CLIPPERS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was opened and used. This is completely unacceptable and unsanitary! I do not recommend this company in the least.
customer_reviews.author: David Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set for travel and a very nice and useful gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Caridad Lopez

customer_reviews.title: He immediately noted the quality of the various components and was very pleased with the set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He immediately noted the quality of the various components and was very pleased with the set. The size is perfect for home or travel. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosentraum

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Man or Woman
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super sharp, well made, and love the packaging. Will make excellent gifts for others. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall! Only downside is the tweezers, they are not as good as the nail clippers and scissors. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description of leather
customer_reviews.text: The description is misleading. It reads fashion leather. I now know that doesn't mean genuine leather. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Quality could be a little more consistent, but it's not too bad. Expected a little more, I guess. Regardless, for $25 it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my wife and I - very compact ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my wife and I - very compact and fits well for our needs - excellent craftsmanship and quality - I recommend this to all
customer_reviews.author: Kim DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not so happy with the quality, looks Chinese to me. German products suppose to be top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Jayaprakash Bhaskar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I wish now that I had purchased a somewhat bigger set.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this set. The case itself was a nice size and well-crafted. Manicure tools are excellent quality. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality, would not suggest this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manicure set.
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, especially for the price we paid! This is a first time kit for a young man. When my husband saw it he thought it was nicer than a lot of kits out there in this price range. I agree....
customer_reviews.author: MellyBelly

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality scissors I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, to an extreme. Smooth operation, obviously great care was taken to make something superior. Case is wonderful, compact.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vene

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Everything needed for taking care of finger and toe nails.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this manicure set. All the blades are dull.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cravins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material, nice selection of tools, and quality case that is also compact.
customer_reviews.author: MSP Mike

customer_reviews.title: the nail clipper just broke! how i can return ...
customer_reviews.text: the nail clipper just broke! how i can return the item since I purchased in Apil and it is not returnable now?
customer_reviews.author: KatDab

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I received what I ordered. no substitutions , no junk.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Biliouris

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needs a few more items that this one is lacking, but it is rather inexpensive & I.think the pieces it does have, will hold up pretty good with use.
customer_reviews.author: PandaG

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit with mostly well made products in decent case that actually does hold everything in place. Fingernail clippers not as sharp/sturdy as I would like, but do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dad in training

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but...
customer_reviews.text: very small instruments. I'd rather have paid more for a larger kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great size with all the basics for an affordable price
customer_reviews.author: Rachel from finance

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the set. It is the best clippers I have owned to date and the carrying case makes it all the much easier for me to keep track of my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Great travel gift. Nice cases too.
customer_reviews.text: These German manicure sets are hard to find & very well-made. A great gift.
customer_reviews.author: DJ, Los Angeles

product_meta.title: 3 Swords Germany - brand quality 8 piece manicure pedicure grooming kit set for professional finger & toe nail care scissors clipper fashion leather case in gift box, Made in Solingen Germany (21309)
feature_bullets: NAIL CARE KIT from 3 Swords Germany with professional manicure and pedicure tools. Our sets for home and travel use convince trough highest levels of quality, modern design, durability and German engineering combined with a first class customer service.
CONTENTS: Nail scissors, cuticle scissors, finger nail clipper, toe nail clipper, tweezers, glass nail file, sapphire nail file (fine and coarse coating), nail pusher/cleaner.

STEEL IMPLEMENTS: Hand made, bright nickel plated (protection against corrosion), polished and hardened. All sets come in an attractive gift box. Instruments are made in Solingen / Germany (except nail clippers).

CASE: Fashion leather black, size ca. 14,0 x 8,0 x 3,0 cm. Our organizers are made of high-grade fashion or classic materials. Additional equipment: Microfiber cleaning cloth for cleaning steel items, general info sheet “Finger - Nail Grooming”.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Please CONTACT US DIRECTLY, we ALWAYS find a solution! A 3 Swords beauty set is a perfect present for women, woman, girls and men and ideal for XMAS, birthday, mothers / fathers day, marriage, thanksgiving and valentines day!
